testimonials.title: Wall of Fame
testimonials.subtitle: See what our happy customers are saying

comments.1: The best biryani I've ever had! The spices were perfectly balanced and the chicken was so tender. Will definitely order again!
comments.2: Amazing seekh kebabs! Reminded me of the street food in Old Delhi. Authentic flavors and great service.
comments.3: Loved the custom biryani builder! Made exactly how I like it - mild spices with extra raita. Creative concept!
comments.4: Being from Hyderabad, I'm very particular about biryani. This place nailed it! Authentic dum style cooking.
comments.5: The live kitchen feature is amazing! Watched my order being prepared. Very transparent and hygienic.
comments.6: Great variety of kebabs! The tandoor items were especially good. Packaging was excellent for delivery.
